name: @tagspaces/tagspaces-md
description: MD editor used by the TagSpaces application and extensions
author: TagSpaces Authors <contact@tagspaces.org>

scripts.clean: npx rimraf build lib esm lib-esm
scripts.copy-files: npx shx cp src/tailwind.css esm && npx shx cp src/tailwind.css lib && npx shx cp src/style.module.css esm && npx shx cp src/style.module.css lib
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run lib:cjs && npm run lib:esm && npm run copy-files
scripts.build-webpack: npm run clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir lib-esm && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && npm run build:css && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir lib-esm && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development && npm run copy-files
scripts.build:css: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production tailwindcss -i src/globals.css -o src/tailwind.css -m
scripts.npmpack: npm run build && npm pack && tar -xvf tagspaces-tagspaces-md-4.3.9.tgz && npx shx cp -rL package/** ../../../tagspaces/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-md && rimraf package
scripts.pkg-publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public
